messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] earthlights
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oooh! If you liked that one I have a neat site for you...this one gives you the satellite picture in *real time*! You can watch as the daylight moves
messages.messageBody:
> Check this out. Interesting to see where all the lights are.
>
> Mary B
>
> http://www.cojoweb.com/earthlights.html
>

Oooh! If you liked that one I have a neat site for you...this one gives you the
satellite picture in *real time*! You can watch as the daylight moves across the
world. And be sure to check out some of the alternate views...way cool!

http://www.fourmilab.ch/cgi-bin/uncgi/Earth?opt=-p&img=learth.evif

Stephanie E.
